value.title: AI and jobs: Humans Still Cheaper Than Artificial Intelligence in Majority of Jobs, MIT Finds

value.title: WHO weighs up AI risks and benefits for health care

value.title: The Role Of AI In Healthcare
value.excerpt: Like every other industry, artificial intelligence (AI) is rapidly transforming the landscape of healthcare and medicine. value.title: Artificial intelligence decreases barrier to treating ultrasonic brain illness
